title: Replace hero section logo with animated video

requirements.text: Replace the static LookyLoo-logo.png file in the hero section with the uploaded LookyLoo-gif.mp4 animated video file (animated orange camera icon). Maintain the same positioning and styling currently applied to the logo image, but render it as a video element instead of an img element.

quotes: the existing file is actually LookyLoo-logo.png. I want to replace with this file I've uploaded
I'll replace the existing LookyLoo-logo.png in the hero section with this new video file

acceptanceCriteria: The hero section displays LookyLoo-gif.mp4 as an auto-playing looped video
The video maintains the same center positioning as the previous logo
The video styling matches the dimensions and appearance of the original logo placement
The static LookyLoo-logo.png is no longer used in the hero section

constraints: Use the exact uploaded file LookyLoo-gif.mp4 without modifications
Preserve all other hero section content and styling
Ensure video plays automatically and loops continuously
nonGoals: Changing any other hero section elements besides the logo replacement
Adjusting hero section text or layout
